main.name: Ugur (Ian) Pekunsal
main.description: I am a web developer at Pavliks, a division of Sylogist
main.bio: I came to Canada from Turkey on my own in 2013 when I was 16. That same year, our high school got a new computer science teacher from Waterloo University. My first experience with coding started from there and continued on through college and my personal life. Now I am a web developer at Pavliks, where I am one of many highly qualified engineers that produce sophisticated but user friendly CRM systems. In the near future I want to become a valued member of the company and make a strong and visible, positive impact. My primary goal is to propel Pavliks to grow consistently while maintaining first class quality and client satisfaction.
main.contactmessage: If you have any additional questions, please contact me!

resume.skillmessage: Below is a list of my current skills. This list is an indication of how fast I can solve problems utilizing these technologies.

work.title: Web Developer
work.description: ● Working with an amazing team to deliver high quality CRM systems.

work.title: Web Development Intern(1 year) ➡️ Junior(1 year)
work.description: ● Wrote custom HTML, PHP, CSS, and JavaScript for existing websites. ● Assisted in troubleshooting issues on web-based systems. ● Tested and gave feedback on new and existing technologies.

work.title: Brand Ambassador
work.description: ● Educated customers of various Muskoka and Beau's products via one-on-one interaction. ● Submitted detailed, accurate reports for inventory, payroll hours, and material used.
